summary: TAKATA RECALL, NHTSA RECALL NUMBER16V384.  SINCE JUNE 1, 2016, FORD HAS NOT REPLACED OUR FRONT PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG.  DUE TO THE NATURE OF THE AIR BAG PROBLEM WE ARE NOT ABLE TO USE THE FRONT PASSENGER FOR FEAR OF INJURY TO THE OCCUPANT.    THIS IS BEEN GOING ON FOR OVER A YEAR,    UPDATED 9/22/2017*JS
